name: AKC12
author: drip knuckles
description:
A
 palette I made for a fictional computer of the same name. here's a 
little lore I made lol, "The AKC12 (AEON Krystal Computer). A 
revolutionary computer with its patented Optic Computing 'Krystal 
Processors', it shows us what the future of computers might just be like
 like"- Technology Magazine, October 1986
